---
title: "quarto add"
---

## NAME

quarto add - 

## SYNOPSIS

```bash
quarto add [OPTIONS]
```

## DESCRIPTION

```

Usage:   quarto add <extension>
Version: 1.8.26                

Description:

  Add an extension to this folder or project

Options:

  -h, --help                   - Show this help.                                                                  
  --no-prompt                  - Do not prompt to confirm actions                                                 
  --embed       <extensionId>  - Embed this extension within another extension (used when authoring extensions).  
  --log         <file>         - Path to log file                                                                 
  --log-level   <level>        - Log level (debug, info, warning, error, critical)                                
  --log-format  <format>       - Log format (plain, json-stream)                                                  
  --quiet                      - Suppress console output.                                                         
  --profile                    - Active project profile(s)                                                        

Commands:

  help  [command]  - Show this help or the help of a sub-command.

Examples:

  Install extension (Github): quarto add <gh-org>/<gh-repo>
  Install extension (file):   quarto add <path-to-zip>     
  Install extension (url):    quarto add <url>             
```
